tweet: Hundreds Throw Cow Dung At Each Other As Diwali Wraps Up In This Village @URL @URL

comments.tweet: @AUTHOR @USER The madness of being in the world is like being in a pool of bullshit🧐😂😂
@AUTHOR @USER For a moment looked like BJP national convention..

@AUTHOR Cow dung is not alien to Indian villages. Ppl make dung cakes, and also use that for plastering the uncemented floor. So, it is common to touch it.

Though playing with it looks stupid, but it's not outrageous!!
@AUTHOR Can totally hear 'Ikk Junoon Ikk Deewangi' playing in the background.
